title: Buttons
description: Buttons can be ```buttons``` or ```p``` or ```div``` tags with the ```.adx-button``` class. To add colour, add the ```colour``` to the ```.adx-button``` class - e.g. ```adx-button-brand-red```.

variants.name: adx-button-group
variants.title: Button Group
variants.description: Button groups can be made from an ```ul``` and ```li``` elements, or from ```divs``` and ```p``` tags.

variants.name: adx-button-stack
variants.title: Button Stack
variants.description: You can arrange them in a stack using ```.adx-button-stack```.
